ROAST BEEF.

Damn, playa.

text: chubbied for comment/name synergy, and nobody better ruin that chubby pi

text: It done got ruined.

name: ganymedeio
text: Three Eighteen

name: kickstart
text: So today I was trying to remember which strip "insane with sass" came from.  I used the OhNoRobot feature, looked for insane, and sass, no dice.  Finally I turned to google and thank Jebus it led me here.  Flynn with his verite Ray.  Wonderful =)

name: cracklewater
text: Any chance you were looking for insane with ass ?

name: dickolas_wang
text: Yee-haw, 200th chubby!

name: ketelcat
text: I agree with sensei hollywood, but I can't do it silently. Nice.

name: expellens
text: 227!  (also my birfday...weird, huh?)

name: cpnglxynchos
text: entirely.

name: belgand
text: Insane with sass inevitably leads to insane with ass. But it does not last. Oh no.

name: daaaaang
text: chubbied until you can no longer breathe

name: rowboat
text:
I'm not going to do the leg work on this, but I unofficially declare this to be the most chubbied single-sentence comment in the history of Assetbar.

Mine gives it 251.

name: deimosrising
text:
RB's finest dis, and he's had a few. Ray looks impassively on; he is the master of the dis, and has total control of his responses.

I use the car of pain line all the damn time.

name: qingofchina
text: Either that or it is Bizarro Ray who never speaks.

name: fallow_fields
text:
haha one big SuperChubby for Bizarro World!

in Bizarro World, Cornelius becomes Lyle, and vice versa.
...in Bizarro World, Philippe is not 5.

name: hoarday4
text: No, philippe is still 5 in bizzaro world. He is a universal constant between all dimensions of space and time. He cannot change.

name: ravindra108
text: In Bizarro World, Philippe is still 5, but he's not a special boy. Bizarro World is sadly deficient in hugs.

name: zeroasalimit
text: I use it aswell, but my friends don't appreciate. :(

name: saru
text: Get new friends.

name: salo
text: And dis them.

name: rapid_roy
text:
Damn Beef, where'd that come from?
Also, tigers don't have manes, silly Mr. Bear.

name: spinynorman
text: Man, Cornelius really fucked up this time. Tigers totally don't have manes.

text: In a real way?

text:
ANIMORPHS

LOVED THEM

text: yikes

name: senseihollywood
text:
strangely enough, my mom took me to school in the car of pain:

'77 Plymouth Volare' Station Wagon with simulated wood panels

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Don't you mean "wood pain els?"

No?

Okay then.

name: petitegitan
text:
Interesting that durin his illness Cornelius cannot write the children's books, but must revert to porn.

I guess I would too.

name: theloneliestmonkey
text: I would like to have a car of pain to take people I know to school in.

name: epicurus
text:
One of the most quotable ever.

Everyone can imagine the car of pain. All can imagine this.

name: whuppins
text: 5'd with a quickness. Probably my favorite strip of all time. Most certainly my favorite single panel of all time, number 4.

name: dougthehead
text: Compare this Roast Beef to the one who picked the worst possible moment to tell Mr. Bear that he wanted to commit suicide at Teodor's party in his first major appearance.  That, my friends, is character development.

name: nutmeg
text:
my god. since i came of age, i've had to take MYSELF to school in the "car of pain:" a purple minivan with an "I LOVE AMERICA" bumper sticker.

then i bought myself fly-ass orange moped with the Hunter S. Thompson logo on the front. now i take myself to school in the vespa of getting-yelled-at-by-assholes-who-do-not-see-mopeds-as-valid-vehicles

name: grayfox
text: The proper response to the yelling is "Fuck you this hog gets 80 miles to the gallon."

name: charchar
text: You dis my hog, you fluff my, um, hog.

name: greenkoolayd
text: you have a hog?

name: presterjohn
text: moped with Gonzo fist ... oh man. No, dog, no.

name: rogergs
text: That underwear cost more than three pounds.

name: centipede_damascus
text: The sass levels of the strip are off the charts!

name: liquidcruelty
text:
I dunno man Roast Beef has proven to be pretty hard, and that mane is hell of sweet, but I wouldn't sass Cornelius like that
it could end badly for you

name: deancain29
text: wicked sack on Beef!

name: heavymetaljesus
text: Oh man, the car of pain is the worst

name: rowboat
text: Judging from the last panel, it's pretty easy to imagine that Beef has a long history of trolling message boards. He and towel could probably go back and forth for hours.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: all question marks and exclamation points.

name: samuraieaux
text: alt text: The car of pain is something all can imagine, all can imagine this

name: chuchurocket
text: it's not uncommon that i use the mom/car/school thing in casual conversation...which is probably why my peers generally regard me as senile.

name: heccibiggs
text:
I have yet to receive an opportunity in my life to say this. Or maybe I have, but in the moment forgot Beef's instance of wicked sack and did not apply it to my own situation. Even so, I will not be happy until I have successfully told someone that I am their mom (mum) and that I have just taken them to school in the car of pain, then requested they repeat what I just said.

I don't know why I'm talking like such a weirdo.

name: pogo
text: I think we all got your point, luv.  Maybe a lorry of pain would be better.  "Car" doesn't sound veddy British to me ear.

name: heccibiggs
text: ...No, we say "car". Contrary to popular believe, we do have cars over here -  we stopped all going around in horse and carriage quite some time ago. Most people are happy enough with the change. God save the Queen!

name: pogo
text: I stand corrected.  BTW, I got 716 hits on Google for "heccibiggs," all of them Achewood.  (I was seeing if "heccibiggs" was a real word or something.)

name: heccibiggs
text:
Nice. No, it's not a real word, it's a nickname. My friend switched the first letters of my first name and surname, and I liked it.

But, how come you got 716 hits and I only got 4?

name: pogo
text: Google limits the hits when they seem to be similar, and there's a place to click to allow all the hits to be displayed.  (Who is your icon picture of?)

name: heccibiggs
text:
Oh, right.

That's me. Yeeeaaah. I'm starting to get worried here. You're researching my username and you want to know all about my avatar. I'm not being funny or anything but... are you planning on killing me and stealing my identity?

name: heccibiggs
text: Also you're a 59 year old man. Genuinely quite worried.

name: pogo
text: On another continent, of course, and just curious.  Sorry for creeeping you out.

name: pogo
text: Aww hell, why should I deny my love?  Where is my sack?

name: phthoggos
text: dude

name: fineoakstructure
text: "Where is my sack? Where am I? My feet hurt!"

name: atticusonline
text: What the hell? I thought it was my idea to stalk heccibiggs! Shit, I haven't even googled her...i am SO bad at this.

name: pogo
text: Dude, she gives her Facebook address in her member info, I've come to find out.

name: atticusonline
text:
dammit, i am terrible at this...shit!

do i sent her things such as chocolates?

name: pogo
text: I would just try the direct approach.  She seems to like that.

name: heccibiggs
text: What? What? What are you doing?

name: pogo
text: Who, me?  I'm trying to get you a date, silly.

name: atticusonline
text: We have now been married for 5 months and I can say without any regret in my heart that you suck as a wife. Also, stop chewing bread weird.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: too funny. chub.

name: atticusonline
text: Heccibiggs, will you marry me? Hint: The answer is yes, you said yes.

name: serf
text: relish it when you get the chance it is one of the greatest experiences human life has to offer.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Nice avatar! I saw them live for the first time a few months ago - they totally put the brown hammer down.

name: serf
text:
the first time i saw them was at ACL (austin city limits) and i was very lucky the act before them was Damien marley, not because I'm a fan, but because there was SO MUCH POT going around. there was a huge haze over the crowd, after he finished we stumbled up to the fourth row and saw ween.

the took the stage like gods, and they rocked like men. it was probably the high point of my 21 years so far.

name: dipstikk
text:
Weren't cats actually bred from a feline of similar size? This is like me trying to get back to my roots by dressing as a howler monkey.

And scaring old people.

Ahahaha.

text: My dad can do an awesome impression of a howler monkey.

text:
calm down. you can't even see it.

name: jfbeardsley
text:
The alt-text here is perhaps the finest example I've seen in any medium of when a semi-colon ought to be used.

"The car of pain is something all can imagine ; all can imagine this."

Achewood is a celebration of the English language.

name: wombatroop
text: For a moment Cornelius appeared to be moving in frame 2.  It's possible I've been reading achewood for too long

text: *says it and cries*
